subject: Get to know Seguno: Canva and Instagram connections ✨(5/5)
description_text:
connect your creative to email. 
 



 
 
 [Image "seguno-canva.jpg?expires=1775078550&signature=6bb6edfe46e4b5a3f0d3e47af183d4d1e2981d7bdce8e291a0927300ea1d7ccf&req=dSMjHsx7m4deXfMW2XS%2Fid3TvKTooM%2B1AtFmA8rD1EED6CHhMfU%3D%0A"] 

 



 
 access your Canva designs within the Seguno editor. 
 from any image-based section, click the “Design with Canva” button to open Canva and start creating without ever leaving Shopify. 
 



 
 connect Canva 

 
 



 
 

 



 
 [Image "instagram.jpg?expires=1775078550&signature=6d3f086bf59e62965d5691a77c9c02c7113931f382a924640b98465111d51bed&req=dSMjHsx9nYVaXPMW2XS%2FiR5tmAYAn7%2F8U%2BEmH8fiveyBrD276Ig%3D%0A"] 
 ​ 
 



 
 [Image "instagram-type.gif?expires=1775078550&signature=6c3dd260259332f49defd61ca5b9abd9ad72eb188c88356a92fb684d41588126&req=dSMjHsx2n4FYXvMW2XS%2FiWcOeenPkGUwWpNvvdloEesRCGWlTpM%3D%0A"] 


 use your Instagram images in Seguno emails 
 access your Instagram feed from any image-based section and insert directly into your email. 
 



 
 connect Instagram
